content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you Juan for coming to see the apartment. I'm open to discussing a fair rental price with you. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to know the rental price of the apartment.
I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
I am dependable and responsible.
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you Juan for your interest in renting the apartment. Based on your reputation as a responsible tenant, I am willing to offer you a rental price of 500 Euros per month. This is the lowest price I am willing to accept for this apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month.
I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
I am dependable and responsible.
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.
I agree to the rental price of 500 Euros per month.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you Juan for agreeing to the rental price of 500 Euros per month. I appreciate your willingness to be a responsible tenant and I am confident that we can have a good working relationship. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
